entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24 with temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 24 with temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
